text: @WhiteHouse @Scavino45 #COVID19 Many westerns say #Chinese were #brainwashed  by #CCP, controlled, has no #freedom. But most of these westerns don't even understand communism, and they don't know how most Chinese desperately want communism after being in #poverty and looked down upon for hundred years.
